trans-unit.source: A derived vclass of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant" /> class with methods that perform input and output operations in addition to the persisting and loading of workflow instances through the persistence process.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant" /> 類別的衍生 vclass，除了透過持續性處理序保存及載入工作流程執行個體外，其方法還會執行輸入和輸出作業。

trans-unit.source: A host executes the following steps (or stages) when persisting an instance:
trans-unit.target: 主機保存執行個體時，會執行下列步驟 (或階段)：

trans-unit.source: Collects values to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 收集要保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Maps fields of monolithic structured values to individual values.
trans-unit.target: 對應整體結構值的欄位與個別值。

trans-unit.source: Issues the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand> to the persistence provider.
trans-unit.target: 核發 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand> 給持續性提供者。

trans-unit.source: Performs I/O under the persistence transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在持續性異動下執行 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A host completes a stage before beginning the next stage.
trans-unit.target: 主機會先結束一個階段再開始進行下一個階段。

trans-unit.source: For example when persisting, the host collects values from all the persistence participants before moving to the second stage.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在進行保存時，主機會先從所有持續性參與者收集值，再進入第二個階段。

trans-unit.source: In the second stage, the host provides all the values collected in the first stage to all persistence participants in the second stage for mapping.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個階段中，主機會將在第一個階段中收集到的所有值提供給第二個階段中的所有持續性參與者，以進行對應。

trans-unit.source: In the third stage, the host provides all the collected values in the first and second stages to the persistence provider when invoking the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 在第三個階段中，主機叫用 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand> 時，會將在第一及第二個階段中收集到的所有值提供給持續性提供者。

trans-unit.source: Then in the fourth stage, the host provides all the collected values to all the persistence IO participants under the persistence transaction.
trans-unit.target: 接著，在第四個階段中，主機會將收集到的所有值提供給持續性異動下的所有持續性 IO 參與者。

trans-unit.source: A host executes the following stages when loading a persistence instance:
trans-unit.target: 主機載入持續性執行個體時，會執行下列階段：

trans-unit.source: Issues the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.LoadWorkflowCommand> and <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.LoadWorkflowByInstanceKeyCommand> to the persistence provider.
trans-unit.target: 核發 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.LoadWorkflowCommand> 和 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.LoadWorkflowByInstanceKeyCommand> 給持續性提供者。

trans-unit.source: Performs I/O under the persistence transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在持續性異動下執行 I/O。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the loaded values.
trans-unit.target: 發行已載入的值。

trans-unit.source: At the highest level, workflow instance extensions that derive from the <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> class can participate in the first (Collect) and second (Map) stages of persisting process and the third stage (Publish) of loading process.
trans-unit.target: 在最高層級時，衍生自 <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> 類別的工作流程執行個體擴充可以參與持續性處理序的第一個 (收集) 和第二個 (對應) 階段，以及載入處理序的第三個 (發行) 階段。

trans-unit.source: Workflow instance extensions deriving from the PersistenceIOParticipant class can additionally participate in the fourth stage of the persisting process and the second stage of the loading process (I/O).
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 PersistenceIOParticipant 類別的工作流程執行個體擴充還可以參與持續性處理序的第四個階段和載入處理序的第二個階段 (I/O)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a transaction is required for the Save operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存作業需要交易，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant" /> object is created with this parameter set to <see langword="true" />, Transaction.Current is guaranteed to be set when BeginOnSave is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant" /> 物件時將這個參數設定為 <see langword="true" />，則叫用 BeginOnSave 時一定會設定 Transaction.Current。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is shared between the persistence provider, all PersistenceIOParticipant extensions, and potentially other transaction participants.
trans-unit.target: 異動會由持續性提供者、所有 PersistenceIOParticipant 擴充共用，同時也可能供其他異動參與者共用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a transaction is required for the Load operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果載入作業需要交易，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant" /> object is created with this parameter set to <see langword="true" />, Transaction.Current is guaranteed to be set when BeginOnLoad is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant" /> 物件時將這個參數設定為 <see langword="true" />，則叫用 BeginOnLoad 時一定會設定 Transaction.Current。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is shared between the persistence provider, all PersistenceIOParticipant extensions, and potentially other transaction participants.
trans-unit.target: 異動會由持續性提供者、所有 PersistenceIOParticipant 擴充共用，同時也可能供其他異動參與者共用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Aborts the pending IO (Load or Save) operation.
trans-unit.target: 中止暫止的 IO (載入或儲存) 作業。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes that override BeginOnSave or BeginOnLoad and might not always complete immediately must override Abort.
trans-unit.target: 若衍生類別會覆寫 BeginOnSave 或 BeginOnLoad，且不一定會立刻完成，則必須覆寫中止。

trans-unit.source: If Abort is invoked, any pending IO operations must be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果叫用中止，則必須取消所有暫止中的 IO 作業。

trans-unit.source: If an operation is canceled in this way, the corresponding End method should throw OperationCanceledException.
trans-unit.target: 如果以這種方式取消作業，對應的 End 方法應會擲回 OperationCanceledException。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of read-write values loaded by the persistence provider.
trans-unit.target: 持續性提供者所載入的讀寫值字典。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the set of read-write values passed to BeginOnSave in the most recent persistence episode for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個字典對應於一組在此執行個體最近的持續性時段中傳遞至 BeginOnSave 的讀寫值。

trans-unit.source: The time span within which the operation should be completed without timing out.
trans-unit.target: 時間範圍，作業應在這段時間範圍內完成而不逾時。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous Load operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，此委派會接收非同步載入作業的完成通知。

trans-unit.source: The state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 與非同步作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to load additional state in conjunction with an instance being loaded from the instance store.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業以載入其他狀態，以及要從執行個體存放區載入的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The status of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of read-write values collected in the CollectValues and MapValues stages.
trans-unit.target: 在 CollectValues 和 MapValues 階段收集到之讀寫值的字典。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of write-only values collected in the CollectValues and MapValues stages.
trans-unit.target: 在 CollectValues 和 MapValues 階段收集到之唯寫值的字典。

trans-unit.source: The time span within which the operation should be completed without timing out.
trans-unit.target: 時間範圍，作業應在這段時間範圍內完成而不逾時。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，此委派會接收到非同步作業完成的通知。

trans-unit.source: The state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 與非同步作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to save additional state in conjunction with an instance being persisted to the instance store.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業以儲存其他狀態，以及要保存至執行個體存放區的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The status of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous result returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant.BeginOnSave(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant.BeginOnSave(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法所傳回的非同步結果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous Load operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步載入作業。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous result returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant.BeginOnSave(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceIOParticipant.BeginOnSave(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法所傳回的非同步結果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous Save operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步儲存作業。
